name: Julius GREER, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Julius GREER, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit for further consideration in light of Alleyne v. United States, 570 U.S. ----, 133 S.Ct. 2151, 186 L.Ed.2d 314 (2013).
casebody.head_matter:
Julius GREER, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 13-7916.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 21, 2014.
Case below, 527 Fed.Appx. 225.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit for further consideration in light of Alleyne v. United States, 570 U.S. ----, 133 S.Ct. 2151, 186 L.Ed.2d 314 (2013).
